statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS ROW_NO , AA.ID , AA.NAME , AA.LOGIN_ID , AA.LOGIN_PW , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Users AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwa.Users ( NAME, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PW, USE_YN, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #NAME# , #LOGIN_ID# , #LOGIN_PW# , #USE_YN# , #REMARKS# , GETDATE() , #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwa.Users SET NAME = #NAME# , LOGIN_ID = #LOGIN_ID# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
